title: Epic Motivational Dubstep Mix - Top Drops of Dubstep (2014 mix)
description: Hurrimix VI+Listen to one of my tracks on http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WDhWDP... ----------------------------------------­------------------------- From an epic start until a banging end, this over-an-hour mix includes songs which will make you get goose bumps. In this dubstep mix you will find tracks of artists mentioned below which have an adrenaline-rushing atmosphere and will completely fit as environmental music while gaming, as an example. Enjoy these delightful songs, like, subscribe and GO! We hope you guys enjoy it and we would like to thank the own artists for making this quality music. Moreover, we invite them not to stop composing dubstep. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~­~~ Track List: 0:00 -- 3:14 Two Steps from Hell -- Strengh of a Thousand Men [Instrumental Core Remix] 3:15 -- 4:54 Instrumental Core -- Race against Time 4:55 -- 7:32 Obsidia -- Lost in Space 7:33 -- 10:55 Double Trouble -- Orchestral Dubstep 10:56 -- 13:35 Duubsolutly -- Dubstep of the Caribbean 13:36 -- 16:31 Instrumental Core -- The Angels among Demons 16:32 -- 19:45 Obsidia -- Another World 19:46 -- 22:42 Mt Eden -- Sierra Leone 22:43 -- 24:19 Skepsist -- Reflux 24:20 -- 29:39 Fonik -- Oblivion 29:40 -- 32:40 Dramatic Symphonic Dubstep Music -- Legendary 32:41 -- 36:18 KPM Music -- Future Classic 36:19 -- 38:51 KillSonik -- Slaughterhouse [Gemini Remix] 38:52 -- 42:52 Instrumental Core -- Oblivion 42:53 -- 44:37 DJ Fresh -- Louder [Flyte One Remix] 44:38 -- 46:53 Two Steps from Hell -- All is Hell that Ends Well 46:54 -- 51:50 Cyberoptics -- Geisha 51:51 -- 55:40 Skorge -- Epilogue 55:41 -- 57:56 Skorge -- The Battle 57:57 -- 1:00:30 Skorge -- Smoke 1:00:31 -- 1:05:20 Obsidia -- Drops of Water ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~­~~ We do not merit ourselves for any of these songs, and we created the mix knowing that making profit of it is illegal. Obviously we are not making any benefits, as said before. All rights are reserved to the artists of these magnificent songs. Also, would we like to justify ourselves: this track list was made just to entertain listeners and even to promote these artists. Finally we would like to thank once more the artists of these tracks.
